Articles.Content:
Geysers spewing toxic gas, acid lakes, volcanoes, Giant fissure's on ice planets/moons. etc etc.

Are these a planned feature to add more to the aspect of exploring, maybe sending out probe's first to map the surface of a body before you decide whether or not to land?

http://wiki.kerbalspaceprogram.com/wiki/Planned_features

This is the list of planned features for future reference.

As for your post on the wiki page for Eeloo it is stated that it is planned to have cryovolcanic activity, how reliable this information is I don't know. Good idea nether the less.
